frontMatter.title: Shuttle Time!
frontMatter.summary: Join us at Claremont Stadium for some shuttle action! All ages welcome. Sign up by Friday, 20th September to join a team. Juvenile Club returns tonight!

next.title: Club Night
next.summary: Join us tonight from 8pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium. All skill levels are welcome; we have 4 courts ready for you!
